name: Eldritch Kittens
description:
Live out your rock fantasies in this visual novel-rhythm game hybrid! As the leader of the band Eldritch Kittens, you have to prove your worth by playing to the beat of dozens of songs from Guitar Hero II, but it won't be easy!

Credits

Producer/Team Lead: Randen Banuelos

Programmer: Kriti Garg

Writers: Guadalupe Limon, Randen Banuelos

Special thanks to Bodhi Donselaar for letting us build off his Unity version of Guitar Hero!
